name: Nurcan Bicakci Arcan
text: This is a thoughtful and timely piece. As AI agents become part of business operations and a hot topic in many organizations, understanding and adapting risk management is crucial. Love how this breaks down the opportunities and the responsibilities that come with innovation. A must-read for leaders navigating the AI era and consider adapting AI agents across their business.
